thread.title: Robbie Williams finally responds to New Year's Eve hand sanitiser drama in typically cheeky fashion
thread.title_full: Robbie Williams finally responds to New Year's Eve hand sanitiser drama in typically cheeky fashion

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Robbie Williams finally responds to New Year's Eve hand sanitiser drama in typically cheeky fashion
text:
Showbiz Robbie Williams finally responds to New Year's Eve hand sanitiser drama in typically cheeky fashion The star cleaned his hands and pulled a disgusted face after touching members of the audience at his concert Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Robbie Williams parodies the hand sanitiser incident on NYE Share this video   
Pop superstar Robbie Williams has given a typically tongue-in-cheek response to the drama created from his New Year's Eve actions . 
While performing at a concert in London live on BBC One as the UK welcomed in 2017, Robbie pulled a gag which could have seriously offended members of the audience - but very much amused people watching at home. 
Viewers branded the incident 'the moment of 2017' (which wasn't actually that much of a compliment as we were only minutes in). 
Robbie had been playing a selection of his hits in the run-up to midnight at a concert in the shadow of Big Ben in the capital. 
While singing Auld Lang Syne, Robbie delighted his fans by making contact with members of the audience. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
